snippet: The Tampa Bay Rays signed David Price, the 2012 American League Cy Young Award winner, to a one-year, $14 million year deal on Thursday.
abstract: Tampa Bay Rays sign pitcher David Price, 2012 American League Cy Young Award winner, to a one-year, $14 million year deal.
lead_paragraph: The Tampa Bay Rays signed David Price, the 2012 American League Cy Young Award winner, to a one-year, $14 million year deal on Thursday.

headline.main: Rays to Pay Price $14 Million in 2014
headline.print_headline: Rays to Pay Price $14 Million in 2014
